courses.title: Introduction to Artificial Intelligence
courses.description: Explore the fundamentals of AI, including machine learning, neural networks, and intelligent systems.

courses.title: Introduction to Machine Learning
courses.description: Learn the foundations of machine learning, including algorithms, models, and practical applications.

courses.title: Python Programming for Beginners
courses.description: Start your programming journey with Python, covering basic syntax to advanced concepts.

courses.title: Mathematics for ML (Linear Algebra, Calculus, Stats)
courses.description: Master essential mathematical concepts required for machine learning, including linear algebra, calculus, and statistics.

courses.title: Data Structures & Algorithms (DSA)
courses.description: Learn fundamental data structures and algorithms for efficient problem-solving and coding interviews.

courses.title: Supervised & Unsupervised Learning
courses.description: Master both supervised and unsupervised learning techniques with hands-on implementation.

courses.title: Deep Learning with Neural Networks
courses.description: Dive deep into neural networks, architectures, and deep learning frameworks.

courses.title: Computer Vision using OpenCV & CNN

courses.title: Natural Language Processing (NLP)

courses.title: Recommendation Systems
courses.description: Build personalized recommendation systems using collaborative and content-based filtering.

courses.title: AI Ethics and Explainability
courses.description: Understand ethical considerations and explainable AI techniques in AI development.

courses.title: AI for Healthcare / Finance / Education (domain-specific)
courses.description: Apply AI techniques to solve real-world problems in healthcare, finance, and education sectors.

courses.title: Data Science with Python

courses.description: Learn data manipulation and analysis using Python's Pandas library.

courses.title: Data Visualization using Matplotlib, Seaborn, Plotly
courses.description: Create stunning data visualizations using popular Python libraries.

courses.title: SQL for Data Science

courses.title: Big Data with Hadoop & Spark

courses.title: Database Management (MongoDB / PostgreSQL / Firebase)

courses.title: AI-Powered Proctoring System
